sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="bonus" table="x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	var total = current.aces + current.twos + current.threes + current.fours + current.fives + current.sixes;

	if (total > 62) {
    return 35; // return the calculated value
} else {

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Scoring</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
 var dice1 = current.dice_1;
 var dice2 = current.dice_2;
 var dice3 = current.dice_3;
 var dice4 = current.dice_4;
 var dice5 = current.dice_5;
 var aces = current.aces;
 var twos = current.twos;
 var threes = current.threes;
 var fours = current.fours;
 var fives = current.fives;
 var sixes = current.sixes;
 var chance = current.chance;
 var full = current.full_house;
 var three = current.three_of_a_kind;
 var four = current.four_of_a_kind;
 var large = current.large_straight;
 var small = current.small_straight;
 var yahtzee = current.yahtzee;
 var roll = [dice1, dice2, dice3, dice4, dice5];
 var order = roll.sort().toString();
 var total = parseInt(dice1, 10) + parseInt(dice2, 10) + parseInt(dice3, 10) + parseInt(dice4, 10) + parseInt(dice5, 10);

 //Aces
 if ((order.indexOf("1,1,1,1,1") > -1)) {
     if (aces == '') {
         current.aces = 5;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("1,1,1,1") > -1)) {
     if (aces == '') {
         current.aces = 4;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("1,1,1") > -1)) {
     if (aces == '') {
         current.aces = 3;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("1,1") > -1)) {
     if (aces == '') {
         current.aces = 2;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("1") > -1)) {
     if (aces == '') {
         current.aces = 1;
     }
 }
	
 //Twos
 if ((order.indexOf("2,2,2,2,2") > -1)) {
     if (twos == '') {
         current.twos = 10;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("2,2,2,2") > -1)) {
     if (twos == '') {
         current.twos = 8;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("2,2,2") > -1)) {
     if (twos == '') {
         current.twos = 6;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("2,2") > -1)) {
     if (twos == '') {
         current.twos = 4;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("2") > -1)) {
     if (twos == '') {
         current.twos = 2;
     }
 }
	
 //Threes
 if ((order.indexOf("3,3,3,3,3") > -1)) {
     if (threes == '') {
         current.threes = 15;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("3,3,3,3") > -1)) {
     if (threes == '') {
         current.threes = 12;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("3,3,3") > -1)) {
     if (threes == '') {
         current.threes = 9;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("3,3") > -1)) {
     if (threes == '') {
         current.threes = 6;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("3") > -1)) {
     if (threes == '') {
         current.threes = 3;
     }
 }
	
 //Fours
 if ((order.indexOf("4,4,4,4,4") > -1)) {
     if (fours == '') {
         current.fours = 20;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("4,4,4,4") > -1)) {
     if (fours == '') {
         current.fours = 16;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("4,4,4") > -1)) {
     if (fours == '') {
         current.fours = 12;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("4,4") > -1)) {
     if (fours == '') {
         current.fours = 8;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("4") > -1)) {
     if (fours == '') {
         current.fours = 4;
     }
 }
	
 //Fives
 if ((order.indexOf("5,5,5,5,5") > -1)) {
     if (fives == '') {
         current.fives = 25;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("5,5,5,5") > -1)) {
     if (fives == '') {
         current.fives = 20;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("5,5,5") > -1)) {
     if (fives == '') {
         current.fives = 15;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("5,5") > -1)) {
     if (fives == '') {
         current.fives = 10;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("5") > -1)) {
     if (fives == '') {
         current.fives = 5;
     }
 }
	
//Sixes
 if ((order.indexOf("6,6,6,6,6") > -1)) {
     if (sixes == '') {
         current.sixes = 30;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("6,6,6,6") > -1)) {
     if (sixes == '') {
         current.sixes = 24;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("6,6,6") > -1)) {
     if (sixes == '') {
         current.sixes = 18;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("6,6") > -1)) {
     if (sixes == '') {
         current.sixes = 12;
     }
 } else if ((order.indexOf("6") > -1)) {
     if (sixes == '') {
         current.sixes = 6;
     }
 }

 //Chance
 if (chance == '') {
     current.chance = total;
 }

 //Yahtzee
 if ((order.indexOf("1,1,1,1,1") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,2,2") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("5,5,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("6,6,6,6,6") > -1)) {
     if (yahtzee == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Yahtzee!!');
         current.yahtzee = 50;
     }
 }

 //Four of a kind
 if (((order.indexOf("1,1,1,1") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,2") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("5,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("6,6,6,6") > -1))) {
     if (four == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Four of a kind!!');
         current.four_of_a_kind = total;
     }
 }

 //Three of a kind
 if (((order.indexOf("1,1,1") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("6,6,6") > -1))) {
     if (three == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Three of a kind!!');
         current.three_of_a_kind = total;
     }
 }

 //Large straight
 if ((order.indexOf("1,2,3,4,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,3,4,5,6") > -1)) {
     if (large == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Large straight!!');
         current.large_straight = 40;
     }
 }

 //Small straight
 if ((order.indexOf("1,2,3,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,2,2,3,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,3,3,4,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,3,4,4,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,3,3,4,4,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,3,4,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,4,5,6") > -1)) {
     if (small == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Small straight!!');
         current.small_straight = 30;
     }
 }

 //Full house
 if ((order.indexOf("1,1,1,2,2") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,1,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,1,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,1,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,1,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,2,2,2") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,2,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,3,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,3,3,3") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,3,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,4,4,4") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,4,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,4,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,5,5,5") > -1) || (order.indexOf("5,5,5,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("1,1,6,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("2,2,6,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("3,3,6,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("4,4,6,6,6") > -1) || (order.indexOf("5,5,6,6,6") > -1)) {
     if (full == '') {
         gs.addInfoMessage('Full house!!');
         current.full_house = 25;
     }
 }

 })(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-12 05:57:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4db4427edb0c9018a14ef6fdbf9619e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Scoring</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Yahtzee" source="x_167856_yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4db4427edb0c9018a14ef6fdbf9619e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-13 17:32:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4db4427edb0c9018a14ef6fdbf9619e1"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_ui_section caption="Instructions" section_id="4a5cb874db4050d4a14ef6fdbf961963" sys_domain="global" table="x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard" version="3" view=""><sys_ui_annotation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_plain_text>false</is_plain_text><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-13 17:19:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>856b61dfdb4c9418a14ef6fdbf9619d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-13 17:19:03</sys_updated_on><text>When you first open a new scorecard, it will have automatically made the first roll for you. 
You may keep a dice value by checking the associated "Keep Dice" box below it.
Any special scores will be automatically populated - the score you choose NOT to keep must be cleared out before saving the form to "re-roll".
Once a score is populated and the record saved, the field will be made read only to keep cheaters from prospering!
To re-roll, just save the form!</text><type display_value="Section Details">19756e5ec3313000bac1addbdfba8f18</type></sys_ui_annotation><sys_ui_element action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>856b61dfdb4c9418a14ef6fdbf9619d1</element><position>0</position><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-13 17:19:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>496b61dfdb4c9418a14ef6fdbf9619d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_ui_formatter/><sys_ui_section caption="Instructions" display_value="Instructions" name="x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard" sys_domain="global" view="Default view">4a5cb874db4050d4a14ef6fdbf961963</sys_ui_section><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-13 17:19:03</sys_updated_on><sys_user/><type>annotation</type></sys_ui_element><sys_ui_section action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><caption>Instructions</caption><header>false</header><name>x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard</name><roles/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_section</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-05 19:28:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4a5cb874db4050d4a14ef6fdbf961963</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Instructions</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Yahtzee" source="x_167856_yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_section_4a5cb874db4050d4a14ef6fdbf961963</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-05 19:28:41</sys_updated_on><sys_user/><title>false</title><view display_value="Default view" name="NULL">Default view</view><view_name/></sys_ui_section></sys_ui_section></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="DELETE" element="instructions" table="x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>edge_encryption_enabled=true</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation/><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Instructions</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value>When you first open a new scorecard, it will have automatically made the first roll for you. 
You may keep a dice value by checking the associated "Keep Dice" box below it.
Any special scores will be automatically populated - the score you choose NOT to keep must be cleared out before saving the form to "re-roll".
Once a score is populated and the record saved, the field will be made read only to keep cheaters from prospering!
To re-roll, just save the form!</default_value><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>instructions</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="String">string</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>5000</max_length><name>x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>true</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-05 19:28:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>bc6cf0b4db4050d4a14ef6fdbf9619f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Instructions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Yahtzee" source="x_167856_yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard_instructions</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-05 19:35:50</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="total" table="x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {
	var aces;
	var twos;
	var threes;
	var fours;
	var fives;
	var sixes;
	var chance;
	var full_house;
	var three_of_a_kind;
	var four_of_a_kind;
	var small_straight;
	var large_straight;
	var yahtzee;
	var bonus = current.bonus;
	var keep_aces = current.keep_aces;
	var keep_twos = current.keep_twos;
	var keep_threes = current.keep_threes;
	var keep_fours = current.keep_fours;
	var keep_fives = current.keep_fives;
	var keep_sixes = current.keep_sixes;
	var keep_full_house = current.keep_full_house;
	var keep_three_of_a_kind = current.keep_three_of_a_kind;
	var keep_four_of_a_kind = current.keep_four_of_a_kind;
	var keep_small_straight = current.keep_small_straight;
	var keep_large_straight = current.keep_large_straight;
	var keep_yahtzee = current.keep_yahtzee;
	var keep_chance = current.keep_chance;
	
	if(keep_aces == true){
		aces = current.aces;
	}
	else{
		aces = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_twos == true){
		twos = current.twos;
	}
	else{
		twos = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_threes == true){
		threes = current.threes;
	}
	else{
		threes = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_fours == true){
		fours = current.fours;
	}
	else{
		fours = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_fives == true){
		fives = current.fives;
	}
	else{
		fives = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_sixes == true){
		sixes = current.sixes;
	}
	else{
		sixes = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_full_house == true){
		full_house = current.full_house;
	}
	else{
		full_house = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_three_of_a_kind == true){
		three_of_a_kind = current.three_of_a_kind;
	}
	else{
		three_of_a_kind = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_four_of_a_kind == true){
		four_of_a_kind = current.four_of_a_kind;
	}
	else{
		four_of_a_kind = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_small_straight == true){
		small_straight = current.small_straight;
	}
	else{
		small_straight = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_large_straight == true){
		large_straight = current.large_straight;
	}
	else{
		large_straight = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_yahtzee == true){
		yahtzee = current.yahtzee;
	}
	else{
		yahtzee = 0;
	}
	
	if(keep_chance == true){
		chance = current.chance;
	}
	else{
		chance = 0;
	}
	
	var total = aces + twos + threes + fours + fives + sixes + chance + full_house + three_of_a_kind + four_of_a_kind + small_straight + large_straight + yahtzee + bonus;
	
if (total == 0) {
    return ''; // return the calculated value
} else {
    return total; // return the calculated value
}

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Total</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>total</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="Integer">integer</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>40</max_length><name>x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>true</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-05 07:51:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>6dbcd22cdbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf9619cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Total</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Yahtzee" source="x_167856_yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Yahtzee">20aadae4dbc8dc94a14ef6fdbf961910</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_x_167856_yahtzee_scorecard_total</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-13 15:10:21</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>true</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>
